rolodexter4.description: The flagship project integrating AI agents, knowledge management, and task automation into a cohesive development ecosystem

knowledge-graph.description: Core system for mapping relationships between files, tasks, and insights across the entire rolodexter4 ecosystem

ui.description: Modern web interface for interacting with rolodexter4's features and visualizing the knowledge graph

tasks.description: Task management and tracking system for organizing development workflows and project initiatives

rolodexter-labs.description: Experimental division focused on R&D, prototyping new features and exploring emerging technologies

research.description: Dedicated research initiative exploring AI, automation, and developer productivity enhancements

community.description: Hub for community engagement, documentation, and collaborative development initiatives

metadata.update_frequency: As needed when new projects or sub-projects are added
